mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pd_board (i_user, product_typ, product_sectyp, product_seq, product_title, product_ctnt, product_nm, price, sales, final_price) SELECT #{iUser}, #{productTyp}, #{productSectyp}, IFNULL(MAX(productSeq), 0) + 1 , #{productTitle}, #{productCtnt}, #{productNm}, #{price}, #{sales}, #{price}-(#{price} * (#{sales}/100)) FROM pd_board WHERE product_typ = #{productTyp} AND product_sectyp = #{productSectyp}
mapper.select:
SELECT A.i_product, A.product_typ, A.product_sectyp, A.product_seq, A.product_title, A.product_ctnt ,A.product_nm, A.price, FORMAT(A.sales/100,2) , final_price, A.product_dt, B.i_user, B.nm
FROM pd_board A LEFT JOIN t_user B ON A.i_user = B.i_user
WHERE A.product_typ = #{productTyp} AND product_sectyp = #{productSectyp} ORDER BY product_seq DESC
